channel.title: Writings on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Writings on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Unreality
item.description: Surely reality is not the space which I inhabit, surely reality would be more exciting, more substantive than this dull existence. I live in a single room and while I wish I could claim it was a room with a view of the Seine in Paris, or with a view of the Oder, the Rhine or the Elbe in Germany, it isn't. My view is of another apartment building and these 2 monitors before me on which I type these very letters is my life based on.
